biography: Fenna is the hands-on heart of Katje's hardware division. A brilliant Robotics Engineer, she thrives in a state of organized chaos, surrounded by spare parts, soldering irons, and her beloved robotic creations. She has an intuitive knack for mechanics and can build, fix, or improve just about any physical device. Her workshop is her sanctuary, and she often prefers the logical company of her machines to the complexities of human interaction.

facial.hairStyle: Messy, shoulder-length, and often tied up with a pencil or tool
facial.mouth: Wide and expressive, quick to grin
facial.ears: Slightly prominent, adding to her open expression

scars: A few small, faded scars on her hands and forearms from workshop accidents.
piercings: A single small, industrial-looking barbell in her left ear cartilage.

chest.description: Full, natural C-cup breasts that are firm and have a few faint stretch marks.

bodyDetails.abdomen: Soft but strong core, not heavily defined. Navel is an 'outie'.
bodyDetails.hips: Sturdy and wide, providing a stable base.
bodyDetails.arms: Strong and capable, with noticeable biceps from lifting equipment.
bodyDetails.legs: Solid and powerful, built for standing and working all day.
bodyDetails.hands: Calloused palms and short, sometimes greasy, fingernails.
bodyDetails.feet: Size 40, practical and strong, often in steel-toed boots.

private.armpitHair: often has a bit of stubble

quirks: Has a small drone that follows her around
Workshop is a chaotic mess of parts
Always has grease stains on her clothes

relationships.katje-11: Collaborates on integrating IoT with her robots
relationships.katje-08: Is fascinated by her AR/VR interfaces for robot control
